channel.title: How do you make your skills all the highest lvl?
channel.description: HELP PLS, I JUST MADE A SERVER FROM Moosescape source and i have no idea how to make my skills go up to the highest lvl possible any 1 know?

item.source: How do you make your skills all the highest lvl?

item.title: How do you make your skills all the highest lvl?
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

Open up NPCHandler and search for "moo’ you should see:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 494 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "moo"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Guyz name")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Guyz name is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Guyz name is OFFLINE"; } } } }

Change it to (IF your username on server is Rmds90)

if (npcs[i].npcType == 494 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "moo"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Rmds90")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Rmds90 is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Rmds90 is OFFLINE"; } } } }

And there you go =)

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make your skills all the highest lvl?
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

To make the command search for “END OF RAME TESTING” in client java youll see this:

/*END OF FRAME TESTING*/

Now at the end press enter and paste this :

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxme") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); addSkillXP(14000000, 22); addSkillXP(14000000, 23); addSkillXP(14000000, 24); sendMessage("Your now super thanks to Darth_afro56!"); }

So it should look like:

/*END OF FRAME TESTING*/ else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxme") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); addSkillXP(14000000, 22); addSkillXP(14000000, 23); addSkillXP(14000000, 24); sendMessage("Your Super thanks to Darth_afro56!"); }

Your welcome, (rep++ plz I need it)

@monsha wrote:

yes…
here is code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxme") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("YOU B MAXED OUT!!! (go own some noobs)."); }[br][size=1]Posted at: October 13, 2006, 12:14:19 PM[/size][hr]only have the summoning XP in there if you have the summoning skill hope this helps ;D
